materials.description: The most fragile material of them all.
materials.name: Nails

materials.description: This material is here exclusively to ease development of one-layer ships; the proper way to make circuits is to develop a separate electrical layer. Choosing this material for a point in the structural layer will automatically make the point inherit the electrical properties from the same material that is found in the materials_electrical json file.
